text: Get three people to do a group selfie with you
Find someone wearing the same color as you and take a photo together
Get someone to teach you a dance move
Find someone with the same zodiac sign as you
Get three compliments from different people
Start a conga line with at least 4 people
Find someone who speaks another language and learn a phrase
Get someone to share their best party story
Find someone with the same birth month as you
Exchange social media handles with three new people
Convince someone to sing a duet with you (no karaoke machine required)
Get someone to reveal their most embarrassing drunk story
Teach someone a silly dance move and get them to perform it in front of others
Find two people who've never met before and make them take a selfie together
Start a fake debate over an absurd topic (e.g., 'Is cereal a soup?') and get at least two people to join in
Get someone to share an unpopular opinion and defend it for one minute
Sneak a funny word (e.g., 'pickle', 'moonwalk', or 'unicorn') into three conversations without being caught
Convince someone to swap an item of clothing or an accessory with you for 10 minutes
Start a group cheer or chant without telling people why they're cheering
Get someone to tell you their color of their underwear
